titles.title: To prohibit Federal interference with the opening and operation of the Gordie Howe International Bridge.
To prohibit Federal interference with the opening and operation of the Gordie Howe International Bridge.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
